trans-unit.source: The system displays the scheduling agreement delivery schedule.

seg-source.mrk: The system displays the scheduling agreement delivery schedule.

target.mrk: 系統會顯示排程協議交貨排程。

<source>MODS_PRIM_HELP_0251_SA_SCHEDULE</source><metadata><othermeta content="8840795487BBE630E10000000A44538D" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_ID"/><othermeta content="HELPX.MODS_XRAY_LOG_PP_F0251" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TECH_NAME"/><othermeta content="STEHLE" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/><othermeta content="MODS_PRIMARY" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_FOLDER_GROUP"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_SHH_KEY"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.FOLDER.IWB_TRANSLATION_MEMORY"/><othermeta content="PP" name="LOIO.FOLDER.TERM_DOMAIN"/><othermeta content="DTA_CON" name="LOIO.IWB_TYPE"/><othermeta content="STEHLE" name="LOIO.IWB_RESPONSIBLE"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.IWB_SHH_KEY"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_context"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_page_url"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_system"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_tour_alias"/><othermeta content="" name="xray_environment"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.CLASS"/><othermeta content="" name="LOIO.KW_CONVREF.OBJID"/><othermeta content="CLOUDSUITE" name="PHIO.IWB_INDUSTRY"/><othermeta content="150" name="PHIO.RELEASE"/><othermeta content="20151007063936" name="PHIO.CREATED_AT"/><othermeta content="STEHLE" name="PHIO.CREATED_BY"/><othermeta content="20151007063936" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_AT"/><othermeta content="STEHLE" name="PHIO.LAST_CHANGED_BY"/><othermeta content="" name="PHIO.IWB_LEVEL"/></metadata>

If there is more than one scheduling agreement for the selected material, you can choose which one you want to display. By default, the system displays the scheduling agreement that is marked in the source list as MRP-relevant. If none of the scheduling agreements is MRP-relevant, the system displays the scheduling agreement for which the latest release has been created.

seg-source.mrk: If there is more than one scheduling agreement for the selected material, you can choose which one you want to display.
By default, the system displays the scheduling agreement that is marked in the source list as MRP-relevant.
If none of the scheduling agreements is MRP-relevant, the system displays the scheduling agreement for which the latest release has been created.

target.mrk: 如果所選物料有超過一個排程協議，則您可以選擇其中一個要顯示的項目。
按預設，系統會顯示在來源清單中標記為 MRP 相關的排程協議。
若排程協議皆不是 MRP 相關，則系統會針對已建立的最新核發顯示排程協議。

trans-unit.source: The system displays the most recently transmitted release for the chosen scheduling agreement. If there is more than one release, you can open a list and choose which one you want to display.

seg-source.mrk: The system displays the most recently transmitted release for the chosen scheduling agreement.
If there is more than one release, you can open a list and choose which one you want to display.

target.mrk: 系統會針對所選排程協議，顯示最新傳送的核發。
如果有超過一個核發，則您可以開啟清單並選擇其中一個要顯示的項目。

trans-unit.source: If there are goods movements for the selected material, you can open the list of goods movements by choosing <uicontrol>Cumulative GR Quantity</uicontrol> in the <uicontrol>MRP Element</uicontrol> column. From this list, you can open a quickview for each material document and navigate from there to the <uicontrol>Material</uicontrol> fact sheet.

seg-source.mrk: If there are goods movements for the selected material, you can open the list of goods movements by choosing <uicontrol>Cumulative GR Quantity</uicontrol> in the <uicontrol>MRP Element</uicontrol> column.
From this list, you can open a quickview for each material document and navigate from there to the <uicontrol>Material</uicontrol> fact sheet.

target.mrk: 如果所選物料有物料異動，您可以透過選擇 <uicontrol>[MRP 元素]</uicontrol> 欄中的 <uicontrol>[累計收貨數量]</uicontrol>，開啟物料異動清單。
您可以從此清單開啟各物料文件的快速檢視，並於該處瀏覽至 <uicontrol>[物料]</uicontrol> 資料表。
